course_description: Students concentrating in Global Religions are required to complete this capstone course during their final Spring semester. a component of the capstone course is the completion of an Integrative Paper or the MTS thesis.
prerequisites: MTS 520G or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.
schedule_location: W 1pm-4pm in Rita Anne Rollins Building_549
sections: Class Nbr: 5430, Section #: 1, Type: SEM, Campus: ATL, Meets: W 1-4p, Instructor: A. Greene, Status: Open
